title: Project Hail Mary Book Club
itunes:title: Project Hail Mary Book Club
description:
Hi space nuts! It's time to discuss our April book club pick: Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir. This book is Olivia’s most-recommended read, and Becca (to her surprise) loved the book, too! In this week’s ep we discuss how we picture Rocky, if we’d ever go to space, and listen to your voicemails about your thoughts on the book. We also have a space food taste test live on the pod to fully get ourselves into the theme!

 

Obsessions 

Olivia: Athleta Cabo Linen Wide Leg Pant

Becca: Athleta Salutation Stash Pocket Tight

 

What we read this week:

Becca:

The Roughest Draft by Emily Wibberley & Austin Siegemund-Broka

Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir

Cover Story by Susan Rigetti

How to Fake It in Hollywood by Ava Wilder (Out June 14) 

Olivia: 

A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J Maas

The Younger Wife by Sally Hepworth

The School For Good Mothers by Jessamine Chan

Sea of Tranquility by Emily St. John Mandel

Flying Solo by Linda Holmes

 

May’s Book Club Pick: Funny You Should Ask by Elissa Sussman

 

Sponsors:

Night - discovernight.com with code BADONPAPER for 20% off almost everything on the site

Prose - take your FREE in-depth hair consultation and get 15% off your first order today at Prose.com/bop.

 

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more! 

 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. 

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Olivia on Instagram @oliviamuenter and Becca @beccamfreeman.
